components/brand/sidebar:
<nav>
    {{#if theme_settings.layout '===' 'left-sidebar'}}
        {{> components/supermarket/sidebar/categories-menu}}
    {{/if}}

    {{#if brand.faceted_search_enabled}}
        {{> components/faceted-search/index brand}}
    {{else}}
        {{#if shop_by_brand}}
            {{#if theme_settings.sidebar_shop_by_brand '>' 9}}
                {{> components/supermarket/sidebar/brands}}
            {{/if}}
        {{/if}}
    {{/if}}
</nav>
components/faceted-search/index:
{{> components/faceted-search/selected-facets this.selected}} {{#any facets visible=true}}
{{#each facets}} {{#if visible}} {{{dynamicComponent 'components/faceted-search/facets'}}} {{/if}} {{/each}}
{{/any}} {{#if this.selected.remove_all_url}} {{lang 'search.faceted.selected.clear-all'}} {{/if}} {{lang 'search.faceted.apply_filters'}}
components/supermarket/sidebar/categorie:
{{lang 'category.label'}}
    {{#if theme_settings.navPages_type '==' 'standard'}} {{#each categories}}
  • {{> components/common/navigation-list idSuffix='-sidebar' theme_settings=../theme_settings category=../category menu_type='standard'}}
    • {{/each}} {{else}} {{#each categories}}
  • {{> components/common/navigation-list idSuffix='-sidebar' theme_settings=../theme_settings category=../category menu_type='mega'}}
    • {{/each}} {{/if}}
{{#if page_type "===" "category"}} {{inject "enableVerticalCurrentCategory" true}} {{else if page_type "===" "product"}} {{inject "enableVerticalCurrentCategory" true}} {{/if}}
components/supermarket/sidebar/brands:
{{lang 'footer.brands'}}

    {{#each shop_by_brand}}
  • {{name}}
    • {{/each}}
  • {{lang 'common.view_all'}}
components/faceted-search/selected-facet:
{{lang 'search.faceted.selected.title'}}

{{#if this.items}}
    {{#each this.items}}
  • {{#if facet '===' 'rating'}} {{lang 'search.faceted.selected.rating-label' rating=title}} {{else}} {{{sanitize title}}} {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
{{else}} {{lang 'search.faceted.selected.no-filters'}} {{/if}} {{#if remove_all_url}} {{lang 'search.faceted.selected.clear-all'}} {{/if}}
components/faceted-search/facets/hierarc:
{{#each this}}
  • {{{sanitize title}}} {{#if ../show_product_counts}} {{#if count}} ({{count}}) {{/if}} {{/if}} {{#if children}} {{> components/faceted-search/facets/hierarchy-children children}} {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
components/faceted-search/facets/rating:
{{#if items}}

{{ title }}

{{#if selected}} {{lang 'search.faceted.clear'}} {{/if}}
    {{#each items}}
  • {{> components/products/ratings rating=title}} {{lang 'search.faceted.rating.and-up'}} {{#if ../show_product_counts}} ({{ count }}) {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
{{/if}}
components/faceted-search/facets/multi:
{{#if items}}

{{ title }}

{{#if selected}} {{lang 'search.faceted.clear'}} {{/if}}
    {{#each items}}
  • {{{sanitize title}}} {{#if ../show_product_counts}} ({{ count }}) {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
{{#if show_more_toggle}} {{lang 'search.faceted.show-more'}} {{/if}}
{{/if}}
components/faceted-search/facets/range:
{{ title }}

{{#if selected}} {{lang 'search.faceted.clear'}} {{/if}}
{{#if this.sort}} {{/if}}
{{settings.money.currency_token}}
{{settings.money.currency_token}}
{{lang 'search.faceted.clear'}}
